statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_failures;
SELECT failure_type, sensor_id, alert_status FROM equipment_failures WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM equipment_failures WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND alert_status = 'active';
SELECT id, failure_type, detection_timestamp FROM equipment_failures ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(id) AS total_failures FROM equipment_failures GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING total_failures > 2;
SELECT * FROM equipment_failures WHERE equipment_id = 123 ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, failure_type, detection_timestamp FROM equipment_failures WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY detection_timestamp ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS total_failures FROM equipment_failures GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING total_failures > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT failure_type FROM equipment_failures WHERE alert_status = 'active' ORDER BY failure_type;
SELECT equipment_id, MAX(detection_timestamp) AS latest_detection FROM equipment_failures GROUP BY equipment_id ORDER BY latest_detection DESC;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentFailures;
SELECT id, equipment_id, failure_timestamp FROM EquipmentFailures WHERE equipment_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentFailures WHERE failure_timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT failure_description FROM EquipmentFailures WHERE equipment_id IN (3, 6, 9);
SELECT team_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM MaintenanceTeams WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentFailures WHERE equipment_id = 1 ORDER BY failure_timestamp DESC;
SELECT failure_description, equipment_id FROM EquipmentFailures WHERE failure_timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND failure_timestamp < '2021-12-31';
SELECT equipment_id, failure_timestamp FROM EquipmentFailures WHERE failure_timestamp BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' ORDER BY equipment_id ASC, failure_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTeams WHERE team_name LIKE '%Maintenance%' OR contact_email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT team_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM MaintenanceTeams WHERE team_id = 3 AND contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT id, location FROM equipment;
SELECT serial_number, location FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM maintenance_team;
SELECT failure_id, equipment_id, failure_timestamp FROM equipment_failure WHERE alert_sent = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT id, serial_number, location FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_leader FROM maintenance_team WHERE team_name LIKE 'Ma%' ORDER BY team_id;

SELECT equipment.serial_number, equipment.location, equipment_failure.failure_timestamp FROM equipment JOIN equipment_failure ON equipment.id = equipment_failure.equipment_id WHERE equipment_failure.alert_sent = TRUE ORDER BY equipment.serial_number;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND last_maintenance_date < '2021-12-01' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_alerts;
SELECT alert_id, equipment_id, alert_time FROM equipment_failure_alerts ORDER BY alert_time DESC;
SELECT alert_description FROM equipment_failure_alerts WHERE alert_type='Critical';
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(alert_id) AS total_alerts FROM equipment_failure_alerts GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE maintenance_team_id=1;
SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_time DESC
SELECT equipment_name, location, last_maintenance FROM equipment WHERE maintenance_team_id = 3 ORDER BY last_maintenance ASC
SELECT alert_id, equipment_id, alert_time, alert_type FROM equipment_failure_alerts WHERE alert_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM maintenance_teams WHERE supervisor_id = 7 AND team_email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT equipment_name, location, last_maintenance FROM equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Generator%'
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'sensor';
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM Equipment ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_status FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_location = 'Room A';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM MaintenanceTeams WHERE team_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM Equipment
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'HVAC'
SELECT equipment_name, location, equipment_type FROM Equipment ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT Sensors.sensor_type, Sensors.sensor_location, Alerts.alert_message FROM Sensors JOIN Alerts ON Sensors.sensor_id = Alerts.sensor_id

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, MaintenanceTeams.team_name, MaintenanceLogs.log_description FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceLogs.alert_id JOIN MaintenanceTeams ON MaintenanceLogs.team_id = MaintenanceTeams.team_id
